mapper.insert: insert into ask_answer (login_name, question_id, answer, best_answer, favorite, approved, approved_by, approved_time, created_time) value(#{loginName}, #{questionId}, #{answer}, #{bestAnswer}, #{favorite}, #{approved}, #{approvedBy}, #{approvedTime}, now())
mapper.select: select *, (select mobile from user where user.login_name = #{loginName}) as mobile from ask_answer where login_name = #{loginName}
mapper.update: update ask_answer set login_name = #{loginName}, question_id = #{questionId}, answer = #{answer}, best_answer = #{bestAnswer}, favorite = #{favorite}, approved = #{approved}, approved_by = #{approvedBy}, approved_time = #{approvedTime} where id = #{id}
